import React,{Component}from'react';import Newsitem from'./Newsitem';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default class News extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={articles:[],loading:false,currentPage:1,articlesPerPage:6};this.handlePageChange=pageNumber=>{this.setState({currentPage:pageNumber});};}async componentDidMount(){const url=`https://newsapi.org/v2/everything?q=nellore&apiKey=3d37246c11894191b62fe0f5c2f80ad3`;// Replace with your API key
